name: SQUARERUN V.2
description:
SQUARERUN V.2

A minimalist "run" game that features a square (you) as the player where you must evade all obstacles standing in your way while moving at a fast constant speed towards the finish line. Its a quick, simple game. If you know the Youtuber BRACKEYS, i'm sure you would be able to tell where this game is inspired from. He is a great beginner Unity teacher, he taught me everything I know about Unity so far in a clear and comfortable manner. I would greatly recommend checking out his channel. This game is a version of his tutorial game, but with me putting a twist on it and some improvements and expansio.n I would most definitely recommend playing this with your friends as a competition to see who would be able to finish all levels first. Good for killing time during this lock down as well.
